alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 1:56PM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Kansas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is not typical January cold. This is some of the coldest arctic air southwest Kansas has seen in years. Becoming stranded outdoors without the necessary protection from the cold will be life threatening. Remember to protect pets and livestock...they feel wind chill too!
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
